question: Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, is the head of which international organisation?
explanation:
The Director-General of World Health Organization (WHO), Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus has recently announced that WHO will initiate an independent review on its handling of the coronavirus pandemic.
The WHO Chief while speaking at the World Health Assembly, announced about the facilitation of the independent review at the earliest. More than 120 countries including India supported the resolution drafted by the European Union calling for a review.
